text: NBA 2K10 is a basketball video game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. It was released on October 6, 2009 on Xbox 360, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, and PSP and on October 12, 2009 on PC. It was released on the Wii on November 9, 2009. Retired Lakers star Kobe Bryant is the cover athlete of the game. The game is the first PSP and Wii release of the NBA 2K series, and the first on a Nintendo system since NBA 2K3 for the GameCube in 2002. ==References== ==Other websites== *NBA 2K10 official website Category:2009 video games Category:NBA 2K Category:2K Sports games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Wii games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: NBA 2K10
